companyName: Power X Solution Technology Inc. | XComp Computer
address1: Unit 4 Alpa Centrum Bldg. Lopez Jaena St.

partnerDetails.about:
Power X is a total IT solutions company.  It offers an end-to-end latest information technology products, services and as well as technical support such as but not limited to:
a.	Network Infrastructure (Copper / Fiber / Wireless Backhaul Connectivity)
b.	Data Center Server & Storage (Converge Infrastructure / Hyper Converge Infrastructure HCI)
c.	Business Continuity (High Availability Back Up / Disaster Recovery / Data Protection Solution)
d.	Cloud Infrastructure (Microsoft Azure / YugaByte DB / Cetrix Mobile Computing)
e.	Virtualization Technology (Cloud / Server / Storage / Network Infrastructure)
f.	IT Security Control (Firewall / Endpoint / Data Loss Protection / Monitoring / Management)
g.	Communications (PABX System / VoIP / Video-teleconferencing Technology)
h.	CCTV Video Surveillance (Analog / IP Network / Video Analytics Installations)
i.	Central Locking System (Biometrics / Face-Recognition / RFID / Keyless Set-up)
j.	IT Manpower Service Contract (IT Support / Maintenance Contract / Outsourcing Services)
